name: Bullets Of Color
description:
Dodge and avoid projectiles that are your color (blue) but touch the other projectiles that are different colors to transform them into missiles to defeat the enemies!

Made as part of the Mini Jam 111: Colors^2 game jam with the limitation "You Are Your Own Enemy"!

Special thanks to my friend (kara) who contributed music and title screen art for this game!

Controls:  Move with mouse  OR keyboard in settings (I recommend mouse mode!)
